title: MerchantSku
description: This schema represents a merchant SKU

product_title.description:
Short product description

			#Valid Values

			1 to 500 alphanumeric characters

jet_browse_node_id.description:
The uniqueID that defines where the product will be found on Jet.com browse structure

			#Valid Values

			This must be a valid jet_browse_node_id

standard_product_code.description:
A standard, unique identifier for a product.  ISBN, UPC, EAN and GTIN-14 are accepted.

			#Valid Values

			*If standard_product_code_type is'UPC' - must be 12 digits

			*If standard_product_code_type is 'ISBN' - must be 13 digits

			*If standard_product_code_type is 'EAN' - must be 13 digits

			*If standard_product_code_type is 'GTIN-14' - must be 14 digits

standard_product_code_type.description:
Indicate the type of standard_product_code that was used.

			#Valid Values

			*UPC

			*ISBN

			*EAN

			*GTIN-14

multipack_quantity.description: Number of items with the given standard_product_code (UPC) that makes up your Merchant SKU

brand.description:
Brand of the Merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			1 to 50 characters

manufacturer.description:
Manufacturer of the Merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			1 to 50 characters

mfr_part_number.description:
Part number provided by the original manufacturer of the Merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 50 characters

product_description.description:
Long description of the Merchant SKU

			#Valid Values

			1 to 2000 characters

bullet_1.description:
Merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

bullet_2.description:
Merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

bullet_3.description:
Merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

bullet_4.description:
Merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

bullet_5.description:
Merchant SKU feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

number_units_for_price_per_unit.description: For Price Per Unit calculations, the number of units included in the merchant SKU. The unit of measure must be specified in order to indicate what is being measured by the unit-count.

type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit.description: The type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit attribute is a label for the number_units_for_price_per_unit. The price per unit can then be constructed by dividing the selling price by the number of units and appending the text "per unit value." For example, for a six-pack of soda, number_units_for_price_per_unit= 6, type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit= can, price per unit = price per can.

shipping_weight_pounds.description:
Weight of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

package_length_inches.description:
Length of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

package_width_inches.description:
Width of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

package_height_inches.description:
Height of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

parent_or_child.description:
Define is sellerSKU is 'Parent' or 'Child'

			#Logic

			This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set MerchantSKUs

			##Valid Values

			*Parent

			*Child

parent_sku.description:
The "SellerSKU" that is the parent for this SellerSKU which has "ParentOrChild" = Child

			#Logic

			This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set MerchantSKUs

			#Valid Values

			This should be a 'SellerSKU' with 'parentOrChild' = 'parent'

relationship.description:
Variation or Accessory

			#Logic

			This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set MerchantSKUs

			##Valid Values

			*Variation

			*Accessory

variation_refinements.description:
The refinements that vary for a set  of Parent/Child MerchantSKUs

			#Logic

			This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set MerchantSKUs
			
			#Valid Values

			The valid 'variation_refinements vary depending on the jet_browse_node_id, see category specific documentation for details

prop_65.description: You must tell us if your product is subject to Proposition 65 rules and regulations.  Proposition 65 requires merchants to provide California consumers with special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm, if those products expose consumers to such materials above certain threshold levels.  The default value for this is "False," so if you do not populate this column, we will assume your product is not subject to this rule.  Please view this Web site for more information: http://www.oehha.ca.gov/.

legal_disclaimer_description.description:
Any legal language required to be displayed with the product.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

cpsia_cautionary_statement_1.description:
Use this field to indicate if a cautionary statement relating to the choking hazards of children's toys and games applies to your product.  These cautionary statements are defined in Section 24 of the Federal Hazardous Substances Act and Section 105 of the Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act of 2008.  They must be displayed on the product packaging and in certain online and catalog advertisements.  You are responsible for determining if a cautionary statement applies to the product.  This can be verified by contacting the product manufacturer or checking the product packaging.   Cautionary statements that you select will be displayed on the product detail page.  If no cautionary statement applies to the product, select "no_warning_applicable".

			#Valid Values

			*Choking hazard balloon

			*choking hazard contains a marble

			*choking hazard contains a small balloon

			*choking hazard is a marble

			*choking hazard is a small balloon

			*choking hazard small parts

			*no warning applicable

If no cautionary statement applies to the product, select "no_warning_applicable".

			#Valid Values

			*choking hazard contains a small balloon

country_of_origin.description:
The country that the item was manufactured in.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 50 characters

safety_warning.description:
If applicable, use to supply any associated warnings for your product.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters
